[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Uu]ser[Ss]ettings/

# Visual Studio cache directory
.vs/

# Rider cache directory
.idea/

# Gradle cache directory (Android)
.gradle/

# Autogenerated VS/MD/Consulo solution and project files
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db

# Unity3D generated meta files
*.pidb.meta
*.pdb.meta
*.mdb.meta

# Crash reports
sysinfo.txt
*.stackdump
